content:
Coin Wiki Our Coin Wiki section has detailed specs on each cryptocurrency (updated daily) that allow you to compare projects with ease.
Graphs of Recent Trends We have graphs from the past 7 days with hourly data for:
 Percent changes Cumulative change Correlations between price/volume Correlations among pairs of coins per category Soon: Frequency analysis of pump/dump graphs, and more!  This website has several goals:  To provide a source of information free of news, active development or speculation. We inform what is available and usable right now. The core of this site is to contruct a wiki based on objective data with sources and provide open source data analysis from common exchanges. Looking forward to add more exchanges for graph data, and add more coins to the mix. In the spirit of keeping the site objective, I’ll keep my own articles section away from the main navigation, but may be reached here

title: Cumulative Price Percents
content: The cumulative percent change indicates how much each pair has changed since 1 hour before the start of the graph (called Day 0). Each point on the graph indicates how much total percent change an investment would have made from Day 0 to that point.

title: Cumulative Volume Percents
content: The cumulative percent change indicates how much each pair has changed since 1 hour before the start of the graph (called Day 0). Each point on the graph indicates how much total percent change an investment would have made from Day 0 to that point.

title: Litecoin - LTC
content: About:  Official website: Released on: Created by: Main purpose: Managing Organization: Type of Organization: Country of Origin: How much do developers own?: Types of transactions: Initial Distribution Method(s): Type of network: Can it be mined?: Primary mining tool: Mining Algorithm: Transaction Speed (transactions per second): Average time to confirm transactions: Consensus protocol: Proof of Work Developer activity over last month: Whitepaper:  Online Community Ranking:  Github developer activity: Twitter activity: Reddit activity: Discord chat activity: BitcoinTalk forum activity: News mentions: Google Search Trends:  Distribution of coin supply:  ICO sale: Mining: Airdrop: Expected End Date:  Finance Data:  Total supply: 21,000,000 BTC Marketcap: Trade Volume: Trade Volume change over last day/month/year: Current Price ($USD): Price percent change in last 24hrs: Lowest price in past 30 days: Highest price in 30 days: Exchanges (where to buy):  General Questions:  How many addresses can I make with each seed: Are wallets / addresses reusable: How many seeds are possible: Does it have multisig wallets: Can I give the public address to everyone: Where can I just invest in it without worry: Which exchanges have this coin: Where can I use this coin to buy something: Is this coin legal: Known scam websites and malicious apps: Which one is the address I can share:  Official Social Media Links:  Twitter: Facebook: LinkedIN: Reddit: Discord: BitcoinTalk: Project Roadmap & Update History:

title: Price Percent Changes
content: Measures the hourly percent changes in price for 2 given pairs.

title: Price Percent vs Volume Percent
content: Shows the correlation between Price Percent Change and Volume Percent Change of each pair.

title: Price vs Volume
content: Shows the correlation between Price and Volume (the actual values) for each pair.

title: Prices (pair vs pair)
content: Each bar represents the correlation in prices between 2 pairs. A strong positive correlation indicates that both pairs rise together and fall together in price. A strong negative correlation implies as one pair is being “pumped” the other is “dumped” in price.

title: Volume Percent Changes
content: Measures the hourly percent changes in volume for 2 given pairs.

title: Volumes (pair vs pair)
content: Each bar represents the correlation in volume between 2 pairs. A strong positive correlation indicates that both pairs rise together and fall together in volume. A strong negative correlation implies as one pair is being “pumped” the other is “dumped” in volume.
